item.title: UNICO AMERICAN CORP 10-K
item.description: UNICO AMERICAN CORP, which is in the Fire, Marine & Casualty Insurance [6331] industry, SEC 10-K filing on July 11, 2022 had 46638 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 1155 instances crusader - 779 instances 2021 - 569 instances loss - 501 instances 31 - 463 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
